Description: I'm selling my minty RGD2127FX. Fixed Bridge, Invisible Shadow, 26.5" scale. It's insanely comfortable due to the balance (ZERO neckdive), sweet forearm bevel, and light weight. The 26.5" scale is perfect, no floppy 7th string and it's so resonant. Upgraded with Seymour Duncan pickups, Nazgul in the bridge and and Sentient in the neck. Great pups. Comes with original Prestige multi-tool and hardshell case. It's never been gigged and hardly even been played. No glossing, no chips, no fret wear, no cracks in neck or neck neck joint. Just restrung with Stringjoy balanced set. Wish I could keep it. I've sold quite a few guitars on ebay with zero issues. Not a big dealer or flipper or anything like that (do get GAS all the time though). So I take time to pack well and all that. No one likes getting a guitar with a one piece of brown paper and two air bags. Continental U.S. Shipping with tracking. Thanks for looking. I'm also listing a nice Prestige RG652FX in Galaxy Black as well as a set of brand new Bare Knuckle pickups I never got around to installing. Specifications for RGD2127FX: Made in:Japan Finish(es):Invisible Shadow (ISH) Body type: Solid body Body material: Basswood Neck joint: AANJ Bridge: Tight-End R-7 fixed Hardware color: Cosmo black Neck Neck type: Wizard-7 Prestige RGD Neck material: 5-piece maple/ wenge w/ KTS titanium rods Scale length: 673.5mm/ 26½" Fingerboard material: Rosewood Fingerboard inlays: Small white dot Frets: 24 / jumbo Nut: Graph Tech Black TUSQ XL Machine heads: Gotoh SG381 (non-locking)
Title: Minty Ibanez RGD2127FX Prestige 7-String, Nazgul Sentient, Japan Invisible Shado
